mapper.select:
select
from resources s where exists (select 1 from role_resource ur where ur.resource_id = s.resource_id and ur.organization_id = s.organization_id and ur.role_id in
#{roleId}
and ur.organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
